high_descs: Go to the desk on your right.
Grab a pencil from the desk.
Walk to the computer desk behind you and to your left.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil under a lamp.

high_descs: Move a step forward, and face to the desk on the right.
Pick up the pencil from the center of the desk.
Carry the pencil and turn to the right. Move forward and then turn left and face the desk on the left.
Hold the pencil and turn on the lamp on the right side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Hold a pencil and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the desk.
Pick the pencil up from the desk.
Turn to the right and then left and turn left again to face the lamp on the desk.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Pick a pencil up and turn a lamp on.
